title: GFI E3: Folder rule count badge
description: Show badge with rule count on each folder item; update when rules change.
acceptance_criteria: Badge shows correct count; updates on rule changes; hidden or 0 when none.

title: Phase 3 Day 7: Rule engine integration
description: Wire watcher → engine → executor → logger; implement caching, match tracking, first-match-wins; add end-to-end pipeline test.
acceptance_criteria: End-to-end processing works; logs written; match tracking prevents reprocess; pipeline test passes.

title: Phase 2 Day 4: File watcher service
description: Implement WatcherService using notify with debouncing, ignore patterns, normalization, and channel dispatch; add integration tests.
acceptance_criteria: Create/modify/rename events detected; debounce works; ignore patterns work; tests pass.

title: Phase 4 Day 9: Folder management UI
description: Build sidebar with FolderList/FolderItem, add-folder dialog, context menu, empty states, styling polish.
acceptance_criteria: Add/remove/enable/disable folders works; sidebar polished; empty state present.

title: Phase 4 Day 11: Condition & action builders
description: Build ConditionBuilder and ActionBuilder with dynamic forms, ALL/ANY/NONE selector, PatternInput, validation, save rule flow.
acceptance_criteria: User can build all P0 conditions/actions; validation prevents invalid rules; save works.

title: Phase 5 Day 12: Preview mode
description: Implement preview Tauri commands and PreviewPanel UI with per-condition results and resolved actions; handle large folders.
acceptance_criteria: Preview shows accurate match results and resolved paths; UI handles large folders.

title: Phase 5 Day 13: Activity log & settings
description: Implement log commands, ActivityLog UI with filtering/search/pagination, and Settings dialog (autostart, notifications, ignore patterns, log retention).
acceptance_criteria: Logs view works with filters/search; settings persist and affect behavior.

title: Phase 4: UI
description: Build folder sidebar and rule list/editor UI.
acceptance_criteria: Day 9–11 tasks done; rule editor functional.

title: Phase 6 Day 14: System integration & release prep
description: Add tray/menu, autostart, pause/resume, polish UI states, cross-platform testing, docs, and release build setup.
acceptance_criteria: Tray + autostart work; UI polished; release builds configured; docs updated.

title: Phase 2 Day 6: Action executor
description: Implement pattern engine and P0 actions (move/copy/rename/sort/delete/script/notify/ignore) with conflict handling and tests.
acceptance_criteria: All P0 actions work with pattern vars; conflicts handled; tests verify file ops.

title: Phase 1 Day 3: Core models & folder commands
description: Define Rust models + serde; add TS types; implement folder Tauri commands and basic UI wiring.
acceptance_criteria: Folder CRUD works from UI; folder picker dialog works; Rust+TS types aligned.

title: Phase 1 Day 2: Database & storage layer
description: Implement SQLite storage with migrations, r2d2 pool, and repositories for folders, rules, logs, match tracking; add unit tests.
acceptance_criteria: Schema migrations run; CRUD repos implemented; unit tests cover core repos.

title: Phase 3 Day 8: Rule CRUD commands & basic rule UI
description: Implement rule Tauri commands (list/get/create/update/delete/toggle/reorder/duplicate/export/import) and basic RuleList/RuleItem UI.
acceptance_criteria: Rule CRUD works from UI; export/import works; cache invalidates on changes.

title: Phase 4 Day 10: Rule list & editor shell
description: Implement RuleList and RuleItem controls, drag reordering, and RuleEditor dialog shell with name input and sections.
acceptance_criteria: Rule list renders; reordering works; editor opens with basic form sections.

title: GFI E4: Keyboard shortcut hints
description: Display keyboard shortcut hints in tooltips/menu items for common actions; platform-aware labels.
acceptance_criteria: Shortcuts displayed; uses Ctrl on Win/Linux; (Cmd later if mac).

title: Phase 1: Foundation
description: Complete scaffolding, storage layer, and core models/folder commands.
acceptance_criteria: Day 1–3 tasks done; repo builds; folder CRUD works.

title: GFI E1: Theme toggle (light/dark/system)
description: Add theme toggle in settings; persist preference via tauri-plugin-store; apply theme class to app.
acceptance_criteria: Light/dark/system toggle works; preference persists; system mode follows OS.

title: Phase 2: Core Engine
description: Implement watcher, condition evaluation, and action executor.
acceptance_criteria: Day 4–6 tasks done; core engine components tested.

title: Phase 2 Day 5: Condition evaluation engine
description: Implement FileInfo extraction and evaluators for P0 conditions (name/ext/size/date/kind/shell); support condition groups and regex capture; add unit tests.
acceptance_criteria: All P0 conditions evaluated correctly; condition groups work; capture groups available; tests cover edge cases.

title: Phase 1 Day 1: Project scaffolding & tooling
description: Initialize Tauri v2 app with React+TS+Vite; configure Tailwind/shadcn; set up Rust workspace and lint/format tooling; add CI lint+typecheck; add LICENSE and README.
acceptance_criteria: App boots; tooling configured (eslint/prettier/rustfmt/clippy); CI passes lint+typecheck; README+LICENSE present.

title: Phase 5: Preview & Logs
description: Add preview mode and activity log + settings.
acceptance_criteria: Day 12–13 tasks done; preview/logs/settings functional.

title: GFI E2: Clear logs confirmation dialog
description: Add confirmation dialog when clearing logs using shadcn AlertDialog.
acceptance_criteria: Dialog confirms before clear; cancel leaves logs intact.

title: Phase 6: Release Prep
description: System tray, autostart, polish, docs, and release build config.
acceptance_criteria: Day 14 tasks done; release builds configured; docs updated.

title: Phase 3: Rule Pipeline
description: Wire rule engine end-to-end and add rule CRUD + basic UI.
acceptance_criteria: Day 7–8 tasks done; pipeline works; rule CRUD functional.
